### Pull Request Template (PR_TEMPLATE.md)

```markdown
## Description

Please provide a brief summary of the changes introduced by this pull request and any additional context. What problem does this solve, or what functionality is added?

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Refactoring
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Other (please specify)

## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [contributing guidelines](./README.md).
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally.
- [ ] I have run `npm run lint` and fixed any linting issues.
- [ ] I have updated the documentation (if necessary).
- [ ] This pull request requires at least 1 approval before merging.

## Related Issues

Please link any issues that are related to this pull request. Example: Closes #123
```
